snippet: Wall Street fell modestly but broadly after the I.M.F.’s decision to withdraw its negotiators from talks in Greece.
abstract: Stocks dip with renewed fears of Greece defaulting on its debts, but rally to end two-week slump.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street fell modestly but broadly after the I.M.F.’s decision to withdraw its negotiators from talks in Greece.

headline.main: Greek Crisis Unnerves Market, but a Small Gain for the Week Ends a Slump
headline.print_headline: Greek Crisis Unnerves Market, but a Small Gain for the Week Ends a Slump
